snippet: Holy Spirit School is closing, taking jobs, salaries and purpose from many veteran teachers.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column notes that Archdiocese of New York is closing Holy Spirit School in the Bronx, one of 25 to close this year, taking jobs, salaries and purpose from many veteran teachers; decision will leave teachers, all past middle-aged, to meet thier fate in severely limited job market with choice between meager severance pay of $5,000 or six months of health coverage.
lead_paragraph: Holy Spirit School is closing, taking jobs, salaries and purpose from many veteran teachers.

headline.print_headline: Teachers Ask About Mission They Lived By
headline.seo: Closing of Holy Spirit School Leaves Teachers Adrift
